National Standards

National Core IG

FHIR Patient Resource as defined in national or regional FHIR Implementation Guides.

Nation Specification Version
Taiwan (TW Core IG ) 1.0.0
Japan (JP Core IG) 1.2.0
South Korea (KR Core IG) 1.0.2
Australia (AU Core IG) 1.0.0
Malaysia (MY Core IG) 1.0.2

Core Patients

FHIR Patient Resource as defined in national or regional FHIR Implementation Guides, such as: IPS: Patient (IPS), TW Core Patient, (JP Core IG): JP Core Patient, KR Core Patient, AU Core Patient, PatientMyCore.

  • The patient profiles are High correlated resources congested with patient:
    • Practitioner
    • PractitionerRole
    • RelatedPerson
    • Organization
